Class javachart.chart.HorizBar 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class javachart.chart.HorizBar 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Bar
           |
           +----javachart.chart.HorizBar
public class HorizBar
extends Bar
A chart element that consists of horizontal Bars, 1 per Datum. Multiple Datasets are clustered side-by-side.

HorizBar(Dataset[], AxisInterface, AxisInterface, Plotarea)

buildDataXfm()
Overrides Bar to swap axes
doBar(Graphics, double, int, int, boolean)
Overrides Bar doBar to draw horizontally, called by doBars
doBarLabel(Graphics, double, int, int)
Overrides Bar doBarLabel to attach to horizontal bars
doDBar(Graphics, double, int, int, boolean)
Overrides Bar to draw horizontal bars

HorizBar 
  public HorizBar(Dataset d[],
                  AxisInterface xAx,
                  AxisInterface yAx,
                  Plotarea subplot)
Parameters:
d - Array of Datasets for this element
xAx - X Axis used to scale this data
yAx - Y Axis used to scale this data
subplot - Plotarea containing this element
